data.name: AutoCodeDatabaseDefinition_TriggerSnippet
data.value:
CREATE TRIGGER {0}.{2} ON {0}.{1} INSTEAD OF Insert AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @Error INT DECLARE @CodeFormat VARCHAR({3}) DECLARE @PropertyName VARCHAR({3}) DECLARE @NewCode VARCHAR({3}) DECLARE @id as UNIQUEIDENTIFIER DECLARE @Query NVARCHAR(2000) DECLARE @Filter VARCHAR(2000) DECLARE @GroupColumn VARCHAR({3}) DECLARE @GroupValue VARCHAR(2000) DECLARE @HelperEnc VARCHAR(10)
SELECT * INTO #t FROM inserted SET @Error = @@ERROR IF @Error > 0 BEGIN ROLLBACK TRANSACTION RETURN END
SET @Error = @@ERROR IF @Error > 0 BEGIN ROLLBACK TRANSACTION RETURN END
DECLARE cur CURSOR FORWARD_ONLY READ_ONLY FOR SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Property = CAST(NULL as varchar({3})), Value = CAST(NULL as varchar({3})), ID, GroupColumn=CAST(NULL as varchar({3})), GroupValue=CAST(NULL as varchar(2000)) FROM #t {4} ) enumAutoCodeValues ORDER BY ID, Property DESC -- Order by ID ASC, then Property name in DESC order. This will ensure that all required -- columns gets their AutoCode value calculated before entire row is saved
DECLARE @lockResult int; EXEC @lockResult = sp_getapplock 'AutoCode {0}.{1}', 'Exclusive'; IF @lockResult < 0 BEGIN RAISERROR ('Cannot insert the record in {0}.{1} because another user''s insert command is still running.', 16, 101); ROLLBACK; RETURN; END
OPEN cur FETCH NEXT FROM cur INTO @PropertyName, @CodeFormat, @id, @GroupColumn, @GroupValue WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN -- If there is no property in current row for which AutoCode value should be calculated -- save current row in target table IF (@PropertyName IS NULL) BEGIN INSERT INTO {0}.{1} SELECT * FROM #t WHERE id = @id;
SET @Error = @@ERROR IF @Error > 0 BEGIN ROLLBACK TRANSACTION CLOSE cur DEALLOCATE cur RETURN END END ELSE BEGIN -- If grouped AutoCode is defined, add check in filter part SET @Filter = NULL IF (@GroupColumn IS NOT NULL AND @GroupColumn <> '') BEGIN -- If group value column is string type, encapsulate it with ' SET @HelperEnc = '' IF (SELECT DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS where TABLE_SCHEMA = '{0}' AND TABLE_NAME = '{1}' AND COLUMN_NAME = @GroupColumn) IN ('char', 'varchar', 'nchar', 'nvarchar', 'text', 'uniqueidentifier', 'date', 'datetime') BEGIN SET @HelperEnc = '''' END SET @Filter = @GroupColumn + ISNULL('=' + @HelperEnc + @GroupValue + @HelperEnc, ' IS NULL') END IF (SELECT DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS where TABLE_SCHEMA = '{0}' AND TABLE_NAME = '{1}' AND COLUMN_NAME = @PropertyName) IN ('int', 'smallint', 'bigint', 'tinyint') BEGIN -- AutoCode for integer types is done inside cursor IF (@CodeFormat = '0' OR @CodeFormat IS NULL) BEGIN SET @Query = 'UPDATE #t SET '+@PropertyName+' = '+ + ' (SELECT ISNULL(MAX('+@PropertyName+'), 0) + 1 FROM {0}.{1} ' + ISNULL( ' WHERE ( ' + @Filter + ' )', '' ) + ' )' + ' WHERE id = '''+CONVERT(NVARCHAR(256), @id, 126)+'''' EXECUTE (@Query) END END ELSE BEGIN -- Autocode for string columns is calculated in stored procedure EXEC @Error = Common.GenerateNextAutoCode '{0}.{1}', @PropertyName, @Filter, @CodeFormat, @NewCode OUTPUT SET @Error = ISNULL(NULLIF(@Error, 0), @@ERROR) IF @Error > 0 BEGIN ROLLBACK TRANSACTION CLOSE cur DEALLOCATE cur RETURN END
SET @Query = 'UPDATE #t SET '+@PropertyName+' = '''+@NewCode+''' WHERE id = '''+CONVERT(NVARCHAR(256), @id, 126)+'''' EXECUTE (@Query) END
SET @Error = @@ERROR IF @Error > 0 BEGIN ROLLBACK TRANSACTION CLOSE cur DEALLOCATE cur RETURN END END
FETCH NEXT FROM cur INTO @PropertyName, @CodeFormat, @id, @GroupColumn, @GroupValue END CLOSE cur DEALLOCATE cur
EXEC sp_releaseapplock 'AutoCode {0}.{1}';

data.name: DataStructureExtendsDatabaseDefinition_Create
data.value: ALTER TABLE {0} ADD CONSTRAINT {1} FOREIGN KEY (ID) REFERENCES {2} (ID) ON DELETE CASCADE {3};

data.name: EntityDatabaseDefinition_Create
data.value: CREATE TABLE {0}.{1} (ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT {2} PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED CONSTRAINT {3} DEFAULT (NEWID())); EXEC Rhetos.DataMigrationApply '{0}', '{1}', 'ID';

PropertyLoggingDefinition_GenericPropertyLogging
data.value: + CASE WHEN inserted.{0} <> deleted.{0} OR inserted.{0} IS NULL AND deleted.{0} IS NOT NULL OR inserted.{0} IS NOT NULL AND deleted.{0} IS NULL THEN ' {0}="' + REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(ISNULL({1}, ''), '&', '&'), '<', '<'), '>', '>'), '"', '"') + '"' ELSE '' END

data.name: ReferencePropertyConstraintDatabaseDefinition_Create
data.value: ALTER TABLE {0} ADD CONSTRAINT {1} FOREIGN KEY ({2}) REFERENCES {3} (ID) {4}

data.name: SqlDefaultPropertyDatabaseDefinition_Create
data.value: ALTER TABLE {0}.{1} ADD CONSTRAINT {3} DEFAULT ({4}) FOR {2};

data.name: SqlTriggerDatabaseDefinition_Create
MoneyPropertyDatabaseDefinition_CreateCheckConstraint
data.value: CONSTRAINT {0} CHECK({1} IS NULL OR {1} = ROUND({1}, 2))

data.name: PropertyDatabaseDefinition_RemoveColumn
CreationTimeDatabaseDefinition_TriggerBody
data.value:
SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE newData SET {2} = GETDATE() FROM {0}.{1} newData INNER JOIN inserted ON inserted.ID = newData.ID WHERE inserted.{2} IS NULL

data.name: ModificationTimeOfDatabaseDefinition_InsertTriggerBody
data.value:
SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE newData SET {2} = GETDATE() FROM {0}.{1} newData INNER JOIN inserted ON inserted.ID = newData.ID WHERE inserted.{2} IS NULL

data.name: ModificationTimeOfDatabaseDefinition_UpdateTriggerBody
data.value:
SET NOCOUNT ON
IF UPDATE({3}) BEGIN UPDATE newData SET {2} = GETDATE() FROM {0}.{1} newData INNER JOIN inserted ON inserted.ID = newData.ID INNER JOIN deleted ON deleted.ID = inserted.ID WHERE inserted.{3} <> deleted.{3} OR inserted.{3} IS NULL AND deleted.{3} IS NOT NULL OR inserted.{3} IS NOT NULL AND deleted.{3} IS NULL END

data.name: LoggingRelatedItemDatabaseDefinition_AfterInsertLog
data.value:
INSERT INTO Common.LogRelatedItem (ID, LogID, TableName, ItemId, Relation) SELECT ID = NEWID(), LogID = ID, TableName = '{2}', ItemId = {0}, Relation = {4} FROM #log WHERE {0} IS NOT NULL;
INSERT INTO Common.LogRelatedItem (ID, LogID, TableName, ItemId, Relation) SELECT ID = NEWID(), LogID = ID, TableName = '{2}', ItemId = {1}, Relation = {4} FROM #log WHERE {1} IS NOT NULL AND ({1} <> {0} OR {0} IS NULL);

data.name: AutoCodeDatabaseDefinition_ColumnDefinition
data.value: UNION ALL SELECT Property = '{0}', Value = CONVERT(NVARCHAR({1}), {0}, 126), ID, GroupColumn=''{2}, GroupValue=''{3} FROM #t
